about_the_game:
You have been put in charge of running the Quesadillaeria! Manage customer orders and cook customized quesadillas in this VR cooking simulator.

Order Station:

Customers are coming and want quesadillas. Play through days of increasing challenge as more and more customers come in each day and request increasingly complex quesadillas. Earn new ingredients to satisfy more customers throughout the game, and make more money!

Build Station:

Select your tortilla! Then sprinkle on some cheese! Then fill it with toppings! Based on your customers order, build the quesadillas and fill it by grabbing handfuls of ingredients and shaking them out over the tortilla. Then select a dipping sauce or two for the side! Make sure to not make a mess and spread things evenly. Otherwise, it could effect your score!

Grill Station:

No one likes a burnt quesadilla! Grill your quesadillas to perfection according to the customer's request. Too raw or too burnt and they might feel less inclined to leave a tip!

Chips Station:

You can't have a quesadilla without chips. Choose from several types of chips and fry them for the customer to enjoy!


Can you manage all four stations and keep your customers happy to get the best possible score each day! Find out in this fan made love letter to the Papa's cooking games of the flash game era in VR!

You have been put in charge of running the Quesadillaeria! Manage customer orders and cook customized quesadillas in this VR cooking simulator.

Order Station:

Customers are coming and want quesadillas. Play through days of increasing challenge as more and more customers come in each day and request increasingly complex quesadillas. Earn new ingredients to satisfy more customers throughout the game, and make more money!

Select your tortilla! Then sprinkle on some cheese! Then fill it with toppings! Based on your customers order, build the quesadillas and fill it by grabbing handfuls of ingredients and shaking them out over the tortilla. Then select a dipping sauce or two for the side! Make sure to not make a mess and spread things evenly. Otherwise, it could effect your score!

Grill Station:

No one likes a burnt quesadilla! Grill your quesadillas to perfection according to the customer's request. Too raw or too burnt and they might feel less inclined to leave a tip!

Chips Station:

You can't have a quesadilla without chips. Choose from several types of chips and fry them for the customer to enjoy!


Can you manage all four stations and keep your customers happy to get the best possible score each day! Find out in this fan made love letter to the Papa's cooking games of the flash game era in VR!
name: Mama's Quesadillaria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

short_description: Make quesadilla's in this VR cooking simulator inspired by the Papa's cooking games made by FlipLine Studio
